Package effects

Class TextItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • effects.TextItem

  • public class TextItem
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for the creation of a TextItem used in the drawing panel for rendering mouse hints
    Since:
    Dec 7, 2017
    Author:
    Olumide Igbiloba
